method.name: swtDefaults
method.description: Creates a new GridDataFactory initialized with the SWT defaults.

method.name: fillDefaults
method.description: Creates a GridDataFactory initialized with defaults that will cause the control to fill its cell.

method.name: defaultsFor
method.description: Returns a GridDataFactory initialized with heuristicly generated defaults for the given control.

method.name: copy
method.description: Creates a copy of the reciever.

method.name: createFrom
method.description: Creates a new GridDataFactory that creates copies of the given GridData by default.

method.name: copyData
method.description: Returns a copy of the given GridData.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a new GridLayout, and initializes it with values from the factory.
